title: Best of the Program | Guests: Sharyl Attkisson & Steve Deace | 1/13/20
description:
Believe it or not, newspapers still exist! And Rep. Rashida Tlaib boasted that her son thinks the planet will end by 2030. Investigative reporter Sharyl Attkisson discusses why she believes the Obama-era government illegally spied on her. Glenn recently sat down with author Kamal Ravikant to hear his amazing story about overcoming addiction and loving life. After missing the Glenn Beck Program’s 20th anniversary on Friday, Glenn finally gets to celebrate with some flashbacks to the good old days. And it’s only fitting to announce BlazeTV’s newest show, “Stu Does America,” premiering soon!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Believe it or not, newspapers still exist! And Rep. Rashida Tlaib boasted that her son thinks the planet will end by 2030. Investigative reporter Sharyl Attkisson discusses why she believes the Obama-era government illegally spied on her. Glenn recently sat down with author Kamal Ravikant to hear his amazing story about overcoming addiction and loving life.
